attributes.action: Give every Special Constable (SC) a monthly allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was an SC in the West Midlands for just over 3 years, between 1989 and 1993, and the only thing we got paid for was travel to and from the station. These days the risks are so higher and for what, a medal after 10 years ! Give them an hourly rate with a maximum amount of 8 hours they can work each week. i am also sure an emergency call-out fee would be handy to.
